name: Unisex Tee Shirts and Womens V-necks
description:
The Unisex tees include:
1. Green Tilted Logo on Black Tee
2. Pink Tilted Logo on Charcoal Tee 
3. Blue Snap-back & Tattoo Panda on Black Tee
4. Keep The Peace Slogan in white/ neon yellow on Blue Tee

Check out these fresh tees by Peace Armor. Featuring a front titled logo graphic across chest, this stylish and comfortable crewneck makes a great addition to your collection. Check out our selection of Peace Armor accessories to finish off the look.

--ALL CREWNECK SHIRTS MADE OF THE SAME MATERIALS--
*Crewneck
*Machine wash cold
*100% Ring-spun cotton
*Made in the USA
    -By Peace Armor

Ladies V-necks available:
1. World Peace logo on Black vneck
2. Shimmer Red Logo on ribs in White 

A comfortable and street style trendy graphic v-neck top perfect for the warmer weather. Peace Armor knows the deal when it comes to the latest in fashion, check out even more graphic tees from us.

*Lightweight v-neck top
*100% Ring-spun cotton
*Contrast logo graphic print on ribs or chest
*Machine wash cold
*Made in the USA
    -By Peace Armor

--**To get your products shipped out faster**--
Please Email Us the design and size you would like when ordering, otherwise we will have to contact you by email before we getting your products ready to ship.

options.name: S, M, L sizes of V-necks
M, L, XL sizes of T-Shirts

name: Accessories
description:
*Original Bic Lighter Pack (5)
-Classic Bic lighters with custom Peace Armor design. Pack includes 5 assorted (at random) classic Bic lighters with child safety.

*The Peace Armor Sticker Pack (6)
-The Peace Armor Sticker Pack contains six of the original high quality vinyl sticker design, and unless you’re scraping them off of road signs, windows, or bathroom stall walls, you can only get them here and at PeaceArmor.com.

*4" Circle Patch Set (2)
-Each patch is made of high quality material to be sewn on and last long. Can be used on hats, shirts, shorts, laptop bags, and backpacks. Change the style of anything you own with these great patches that come in many color options. 
  --Choose any two color schemes when ordering patches otherwise we will choose colors at random. 

*Gym shorts with pockets
- Each pair of shorts has 2 side pockets and a drawstring. Made from highly breathable/ vented material which is great for all sports.

--**To get your products shipped out faster**--
Please include note which tells us which color schemes you would like when ordering, otherwise we will have to contact you by email before getting your products ready to ship.

name: Stitched Classic Logo Headwear
description:
The Peace Armor Classic Logo Beanies and Snap-back Hats

The Classic logo Beanies and hats have been Peace Armor’s most comfortable headwear since the brand’s birth and it’s skate style design is sure to stick around from now through eternity. Made from 100% acrylic and featuring a ribbed knit throughout with a Peace Armor logo embroidered, these beanies and hats are an every day necessity. Check out more color options of all the headwear to pair them with all your favorite hoodies and tees.

--Beanies--
*Peace Armor Logo design embroidered on front
*Colors Available: Black with Green logo or Grey with Black logo
*Ribbed Knit
*Slouchy Fit
*100% Acrylic

--Snap-back Hats--
*Colors available: Black hat/ Red Brim with matching Red logo
                            Grey hat/ Grey brim with Green Logo
*Flat brim snapback hat
*Classic green underbill
*Adjustable snapback closure
*Top button with eyelets
*Classic Peace Armor logo embroidered at front
*Signature Peace Armor Text embroidered at back
*80% acrylic, 20% wool
*Made in the USA

By Peace Armor

--**To get your products shipped out faster**--
Please include note which tells us the product and color scheme you would like when ordering, otherwise we will have to contact you by email before getting your products ready to ship.
